title: ICE: compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/sty.rs:1919:18: `simd_size_and_type` called on invalid type

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
### Code ```Rust # ! [ feature ( platform_intrinsics ) ] # ! ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.49.0-nightly (91a79fb29 2020-10-07) binary: rustc commit-hash: 91a79fb29ac78d057d04dbe86be13d5dcc64309a commit-date: 2020-10-07 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.49.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0 ``` ### Error output ``` warning: struct is never constructed: `i8x1` --> mutant.rs:7:28 | 7 | # [ repr ( simd ) ] struct i8x1 ( i8 ) ;
